shortdesc.ph: Enables or disables an extension feature.

p.codeblock: virtual int enableExtension(const char* provider, const char* extension, const ExtensionInfo& extensionInfo, bool enable = true) = 0;
public abstract int enableExtension(String provider, String extension, boolean enable);

section.p: By calling this method, you can dynamically enable or disable an extension without changing the processing flow. For example, enabling or disabling Extension_A means the data will be processed by or bypass Extension_A.
You can dynamically enable or disable an extension feature by calling this method without changing the processing flow.
section.note: For compatibility, if you have not called , will automatically register the specified extension. It is recommended to call explicitly.
automatically registers the specified extension if is not called, to ensure compatibility. It is recommended to explicitly call .

plentry.pd: The name of the extension provider, for example, agora.io.
The name of the extension, for example, agora.beauty.
The ExtensionInfo object representing the extension information.

Whether to enable the extension:
: (Default) Enable the extension.
: Disable the extension.
The name of the extension provider, e.g., agora.io.
The name of the extension feature, e.g., agora.beauty.

Whether to enable the extension feature:
: (default) Enable the extension feature.
: Disable the extension feature.
